basics.name: Jason Laumeister
basics.label: Experienced engineering leader with a proven track record in full-stack development, product delivery, and technical consulting. Expertise in leading cross-functional engineering teams.

highlights: Led the architecture and development of an Integration Platform as a Service (iPaaS) solution.one
Focused on scalable architecture, system interoperability, and seamless data integration across diverse applications including LLM AI.
Managed daily operations of a private horse ranch, including property oversight, tenant coordination, and facilities maintenance.
Served on the board of a registered charitable 501(c)(3) trust, contributing to organizational governance and strategic philanthropic planning.
Developed proprietary distributed software for the management and distribution of energy across intrastate power grids.
Designed and implemented integrations between Issuu's publishing platform and third-party tools such as Adobe and Canva.
Collaborated with the marketing team to define product priorities and roadmap features.
Sole U.S.-based engineer coordinating with distributed teams in Denmark, Germany, and Portugal.
Led the development of a financial technology platform enabling pooled income contracts as a safety net against income volatility.
Directed Agile development processes and managed an international engineering team.
Contributed to product design, feature scoping, and implementation strategy.

work.position: Software Systems Architect & Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Developed a SaaS licensing server for a major cloud storage provider.
Built a GIS application for tracking feral animal colonies and TNR programs.
Consulted on livestock management systems for an agricultural technology startup.

work.position: Software Systems Architect & Engineering Team Lead
work.summary: Led five person engineering architecture team during project design phase.
highlights: Led system architecture for a financial services portal, managing a five-person architecture team.
Delivered full-stack solutions (Angular frontend, Java/PostgreSQL backend).
Integrated third-party services such as Yodlee, Albridge, and IAM systems.
Designed containerized microservices architecture using Docker and Rancher.

work.position: Software Systems Architect & Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Advised Persistent Systems on CIAM project implementation.
Developed mesh-networked sensor solutions for stealth startups.
Designed remote-enabled GPS sensor networks for agricultural asset tracking.
Prototyped a decentralized blockchain platform for local energy trading.

work.summary: Full time Position. Professional Services Consultant on multiple CIAM projects for multiple clients.
highlights: Lead consultant for large-scale CIAM projects across global enterprise clients.
Designed and deployed integrations involving CMS, CRM, ESP, and DMP platforms.
Built the Professional Services function from the ground up, including internal documentation and onboarding.
Notable clients: Turner, Sony, GE, Marriott, Time Warner, NBA, NFL, Universal Music Group, American Heart Association, and others.
Reported directly to CTO, developing secure system admin tools and release procedures.
Designed and implemented data connectors for large-scale SQL and NoSQL data sources, enabling integration with high-volume distributed data systems commonly used in big data architectures.
Managed distributed development teams for 3D printing and custom manufacturing software.
Coauthored a patent for a 3D object application builder.
Built real-time pricing APIs based on CAD/STL object properties, royalty calculations, and international currency conversion.
Developed 3D object editors and custom checkout systems integrated with partner manufacturing services.

work.position: API Projects Manager, Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Lead developer of Design Within Reach shopping app, a 2013 Webby Award nominee for excellence in mobile commerce.
Designed scalable REST APIs for mobile and web commerce platforms.
Integrated backend systems for Fortune 1000 retail partners.
Developed branded casual gaming site in partnership with Pogo and Electronic Arts.
Designed monetization, ad services, and payment processing systems for social gaming apps.
Created Facebook/MySpace social games with dynamic virtual economies.
Integrated advertising and payment platforms, social authentication, and viral engagement mechanisms.
Early engineering hire; established release processes and coding standards.
Built core eCommerce systems including checkout, coupons, and gift certificates.
Led CMS adoption for Yahoo Autos and managed RSS feed integration on Yahoo homepage.
Contributed to record-setting engagement during international auto show coverage.

publications.name: US Patent Office
publications.summary: Coauthored patent '3 Dimensional Manufactured Object Application Builder'

skills.name: Experience
keywords: Experienced engineering leader with a proven track record in full-stack development, product delivery, and technical consulting.
Expertise in leading cross-functional engineering teams, delivering complex software projects, and integrating large-scale systems such as eCommerce, financial services, and manufacturing.
Software Product Development & Systems Architecture through design, implementation, and delivery.
Engineering Team Management focused on collaboration, performance, and retention.
Implementation of Agile methodologies and repeatable processes.
Multi-Vendor System Integration of third-party platforms and APIs across complex distributed environments.
Design and deployment of RESTful & Stateful APIs, ORM layers, and high-performance data stores.
Development of secure, scalable online commerce platforms, payment gateways, and financial data integration layers.
Architecture and development of merchandising solutions with dynamic cataloging and inventory management. App Developer of Webby Awards 2013 Nominee Mobile Shopping Apps.
CIAM / IAM Implementation & Security Best Practices including identity frameworks, SSO, and authentication/authorization protocols.
Blockchain technologies including smart contracts and decentralized apps (dApps).
